## Concept[](#concept "Permalink to this heading")

Retrievers are responsible for fetching the most relevant context given a user query (or chat message).

It can be built on top of [Indices](https://docs.llamaindex.ai/en/stable/core_modules/data_modules/index/root.html), but can also be defined independently. It is used as a key building block in [Query Engines](https://docs.llamaindex.ai/en/stable/core_modules/query_modules/query_engine/root.html) (and [Chat Engines](https://docs.llamaindex.ai/en/stable/core_modules/query_modules/chat_engines/root.html)) for retrieving relevant context.
